entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student in Professor Umbridge's class.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student in Professor Umbridge's class who is known for raising her hand to ask questions.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: The teacher of the class, who seems to have a strategy for dealing with students who raise their hands.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are classmates and seem to be friends, as evidenced by Harry noticing Hermione's hand in the air again.
Professor Umbridge is the authority figure in the class, as she instructs and disciplines the students.
